title: New: Sacred Animals x Steffaloo – On Fire
content:
I’m fairly sure that I’m yet to hear a Steffaloo collaboration that I haven’t enjoyed, she’s almost becoming the bloggers version of David Guetta.

This new joint effort sees Dublin’s Darragh Nolan aka Sacred Animals transforming the title track of Steffaloo’s recent EP into a blissfully atmospheric number, fashioning a composition that is both hauntingly moving and bewitchingly powerful. As per, the vocals are of the highest quality, whilst the backing instrumentation glides perfectly alongside.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
